channel.title: Avery's Data Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Avery's Data Blog

item.description: My name is Avery Rogers, and I’m a student at Stanford University completing my MS in computer science and BA in economics. I’m fascinated by the world of data and statistics and am actively seeking a job in data science and analytics. My favorite package suite is R’s tidyverse ecosystem, and most of my work is done there. When I’m not coding, I love going for night runs around the Stanford campus, getting overly competitive in team sports, and playing singing while playing amateur guitar.
